brief.content-text:
Diagram 1, Image
The diagram has two images describing how pairs, identified as Pair 2 and Pair 3, are swapped between the T568A and T568B wiring standards.
The pin number, the wire color, and pair number are listed here for each standard:
Standard T568A
One.Green/White, Pair 3.
Two.Green, Pair 3.
Three.Orange/White, Pair 2.
Four.Blue.
Five.Blue/White.
Six.Orange, Pair 2.
Seven.Brown/White. Pair 4.
Eight.Brown, Pair 4.

Standard T586B
One.Orange/White, Pair 2.
Two.Orange, Pair 2.
Three.Green/White, Pair 3.
Four.Blue.
Five.Blue/White.
Six.Green, Pair 3.
Seven.Brown/White, Pair 4.
Eight.Brown, Pair 4.
